name: Single filer at high income in Neuchâtel (2026)
description: Single person earning CHF 200,000 in Neuchâtel, one of the highest-tax cantons

sources.description: Neuchâtel has among Switzerland's highest tax rates. Taxable income for federal: 200000 - 12230 - 5000 = 182770. Federal tax ~10785 CHF. Cantonal/Municipal 20% for high income (>150k). Social 6.115% (unemployment capped at 148200).
